input: Sam Goodman 's biography of the Spartan general Xenophanes conveys a vivid sense of the difficulties (he) faced in his research. <sep> Pronoun:he <sep> Noun: Goodman

Mark was close to Mr. Singer 's heels. He heard him calling for the captain , promising him, in the jargon everyone talked that night, that not one thing should be damaged on the ship except only the ammunition, but the captain and all (his) crew had best stay in the cabin until the work was over. <sep> Pronoun:his <sep> Noun: Mark
